data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Why allow a painful past to destroy your perfect future.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: If you’re not scared a lot you’re not doing very much.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Success lies in a masterful consistency around the fundamentals.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Life is a series of moments. If you miss the moments, you miss your life.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: To the victim, adversity is bad. To the leader and warrior, hard times are life’s richest times of growth, opportunity, and possibility. Use them to fly.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Ideation without execution is delusion.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Once you slay one fear you’ll conquer many fears.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: What makes mastery is not the absence of failure but the absence of giving up.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Average people talk about people. Exceptional people discuss their dreams.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Stop watching the news. Start doing your dreams.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The secret to productivity is simplicity.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The secret of passion is purpose.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: When you go to where your fear lives, your freedom starts to display itself.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The smallest of actions is always better than the noblest of intentions.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Greatness on the outside begins within.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: What makes a champion is not how elegantly you start, but how strongly you finish.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Be willing to do what’s hard now to enjoy what’s beautiful later.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Mistake is a mistake only if you make it twice.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Be the CEO of your life.
